00019 REGISTER_TYPE(XDriverList, IPS120, "Oxford IPS-120 magnet power supply");

00021 XPS120::XPS120(const char *name, bool runtime,
00022                const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00023                const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00024                const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00025                const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers) :
00026     XOxfordDriver<XMagnetPS>(name, runtime, scalarentries, interfaces, thermometers, drivers)

00029 
00030 void
00031 XPS120::setActivity(int val) throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError&)
00032 {
00033     int ret;
00034     interface()->lock();
00035     try {
00036         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00037         {
00038             //query Activity
00039             interface()->query("X");
00040             if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*2dP%*2d", &ret) != 1)
00041                 throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00042             if(ret == val) break;
00043             interface()->sendf("A%u", val);
00044             msecsleep(i * 100);
00045         }
00046     }
00047     catch (XKameError &e) {
00048         interface()->unlock();
00049         throw e;
00050     }
00051     interface()->unlock();
00052 }
00053 
00054 void
00055 XPS120::toPersistent()
00056 {
00057     interface()->lock();
00058     try {
00059         //Set to HOLD
00060         interface()->send("A0");
00061         msecsleep(100);
00062 
00063         setPCSHeater(false);
00064     }
00065     catch (XKameError& e) {
00066         interface()->unlock();
00067         throw e;
00068     }
00069     interface()->unlock();
00070 }
00071 
00072 void
00073 XPS120::toZero()
00074 {
00075     interface()->lock();
00076     try {
00077         int ret;
00078         //query Activity
00079         interface()->query("X");
00080         if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*2dP%*2d", &ret) != 1)
00081             throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00082         //CLAMPED
00083         if(ret == 4)
00084         {
00085             //Set to HOLD
00086             setActivity(0);
00087             msecsleep(100);
00088         }
00089         //Set to TO_ZERO
00090         setActivity(2);
00091     }
00092     catch (XInterface::XInterfaceError&e) {
00093         interface()->unlock();
00094         throw e;
00095     }
00096     interface()->unlock();
00097 }
00098 void
00099 XPS120::toNonPersistent()
00100 {
00101     interface()->lock();
00102     try {
00103         int ret;
00104         for(int i = 0; i < 3; i++)
00105         {
00106             msecsleep(100);
00107             //query MODE
00108             interface()->query("X");
00109             if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%*1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*1d%1dP%*2d", &ret) != 1)
00110                 throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00111             if(ret == 0) break; //At rest
00112         }
00113         if(ret != 0)
00114             throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(
00115                 i18n("Cannot enter non-persistent mode. Output is busy."), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00116     
00117         //Set to HOLD
00118         setActivity(0);
00119     
00120         setPCSHeater(true);
00121     }
00122     catch (XKameError& e) {
00123         interface()->unlock();
00124         throw e;
00125     }
00126     interface()->unlock();
00127 }
00128 void
00129 XPS120::toSetPoint()
00130 {
00131     interface()->lock();
00132     try {
00133         int ret;
00134         //query Activity
00135         interface()->query("X");
00136         if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*2dP%*2d", &ret) != 1)
00137             throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00138         //CLAMPED
00139         if(ret == 4)
00140         {
00141             //Set to HOLD
00142             setActivity(0);
00143             msecsleep(300);
00144         }
00145         setActivity(1);
00146     }
00147     catch (XKameError& e) {
00148         interface()->unlock();
00149         throw e;
00150     }
00151     interface()->unlock();
00152 }
00153 
00154 void
00155 XPS120::setPoint(double field)
00156 {
00157     for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00158     {
00159         int df;
00160         if(fabs(getTargetField() - field) < fieldResolution()) break;
00161         msecsleep(100);
00162         interface()->sendf("P%d", ((field >= 0) ? 1 : 2));
00163         df = lrint(fabs(field) / fieldResolution());
00164         interface()->sendf("J%d", df);
00165     }
00166 }
00167 void
00168 XIPS120::setPoint(double field)
00169 {
00170     for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00171     {
00172         if(fabs(getTargetField() - field) < fieldResolution()) break;
00173         msecsleep(100);
00174         interface()->sendf("J%f", field);
00175     }
00176 }
00177 
00178 double
00179 XPS120::getMagnetField()
00180 {
00181     if(isPCSHeaterOn())
00182     {
00183         return getOutputField();
00184     }
00185     else
00186     {
00187         return getPersistentField();
00188     }
00189 }
00190 double
00191 XIPS120::getSweepRate()
00192 {
00193     return read(9);
00194 }
00195 double
00196 XPS120::getSweepRate()
00197 {
00198     return read(9) * fieldResolution();
00199 }
00200 double
00201 XIPS120::getTargetField()
00202 {
00203     return read(8);
00204 }
00205 double
00206 XPS120::getTargetField()
00207 {
00208     int ret;
00209     interface()->query("X");
00210     if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%*1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*2dP%1d%*1d", &ret) != 1)
00211         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00212     return ((ret & 4) ? -1 : 1) * fabs(read(8) * fieldResolution());
00213 }
00214 double
00215 XIPS120::getPersistentField()
00216 {
00217     return read(18);
00218 }
00219 double
00220 XPS120::getPersistentField()
00221 {
00222     int ret;
00223     interface()->query("X");
00224     if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%*1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*2dP%1d%*1d", &ret) != 1)
00225         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00226     return ((ret & 2) ? -1 : 1) * fabs(read(18) * fieldResolution());
00227 }
00228 double
00229 XIPS120::getOutputField()
00230 {
00231     return read(7);
00232 }
00233 double
00234 XPS120::getOutputField()
00235 {
00236     int ret;
00237     interface()->query("X");
00238     if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%*1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*2dP%1d%*1d", &ret) != 1)
00239         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00240     return ((ret & 1) ? -1 : 1) * fabs(read(7) * fieldResolution());
00241 }
00242 double
00243 XIPS120::getOutputVolt()
00244 {
00245     return read(1);
00246 }
00247 double
00248 XPS120::getOutputVolt()
00249 {
00250     return read(1) * voltageResolution();
00251 }
00252 double
00253 XIPS120::getOutputCurrent()
00254 {
00255     return read(0);
00256 }
00257 double
00258 XPS120::getOutputCurrent()
00259 {
00260     int ret;
00261     interface()->query("X");
00262     if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%*1dC%*1dH%*1dM%*2dP%1d%*1d", &ret) != 1)
00263         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00264     return ((ret & 1) ? -1 : 1) * fabs(read(0) * currentResolution());
00265 }
00266 bool
00267 XPS120::isPCSHeaterOn()
00268 {
00269     int ret;
00270     interface()->query("X");
00271     if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%*1dC%*1dH%1dM%*2dP%*2d", &ret) != 1)
00272         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00273     return (ret == 1) || (ret == 8) || (ret == 5); //On or Fault or NOPCS
00274 }
00275 bool
00276 XPS120::isPCSFitted()
00277 {
00278     int ret;
00279     interface()->query("X");
00280     if(interface()->scanf("X%*2dA%*1dC%*1dH%1dM%*2dP%*2d", &ret) != 1)
00281         throw XInterface::XConvError(__FILE__, __LINE__);
00282     return (ret != 8);
00283 }
00284 void
00285 XPS120::setPCSHeater(bool val) throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError&)
00286 {
00287     interface()->sendf("H%u", (unsigned int)(val ? 1 : 0));
00288     msecsleep(200);
00289     if(isPCSHeaterOn() != val)
00290         throw XInterface::XInterfaceError(
00291             i18n("Persistent Switch Heater not responding"), __FILE__, __LINE__);
00292 }
00293 void
00294 XIPS120::setRate(double hpm)
00295 {
00296     for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00297     {
00298         if(fabs(getSweepRate() - hpm) < fieldResolution()) break;
00299         interface()->sendf("T%f", hpm);
00300         msecsleep(100);
00301     }
00302 }
00303 
00304 void
00305 XPS120::setRate(double hpm)
00306 {
00307     int ihpm = lrint(hpm / fieldResolution());
00308     for(int i = 0; i < 2; i++)
00309     {
00310         if(fabs(getSweepRate() - hpm) < fieldResolution()) break;
00311         interface()->sendf("T%d", ihpm);
00312         msecsleep(100);
00313     }
00314 }
00315 
00316 void
00317 XIPS120::open() throw (XInterface::XInterfaceError &)
00318 {
00319     interface()->send("$Q6");
00320     start();
00321 }
